about_the_game:
Deep in the heart of the city lies a bank unlike any other. Rumors abound of a treasure so valuable that it could make a person unimaginably wealthy - a treasure that is worth millions, billions, and even trillions.

It is said that the treasure is hidden deep within the bank's vault, behind a series of locks and puzzles that are almost impossible to solve. But for those brave enough to attempt the heist, the rewards could be astronomical.

As you make your way into the bank, you can feel the weight of the heist pressing down on you. The guards are everywhere, their eyes scanning for any sign of trouble. But you have a plan, and you are determined to see it through.

You'll need to solve puzzles and decipher codes, all while avoiding the watchful eyes of the guards. The vault itself is a maze of twisting corridors and hidden traps, but you are determined to find the golden and shiny stone that lies within.

As you make your way deeper into the vault, you can feel the tension mounting. Will you be able to make it out alive? Will you be able to claim the treasure that awaits you? Only time will tell.

Goal:
Snatch the stone and give it to your company.

JOIN THE DISCORD FUN!!!
https://discord.gg/MMrKsAQJaN

name: Bank Robbery - Dr.Pumpkin DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 Bit Windows 8 or 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7 or above / RYZEN 5 2600
  • Graphics: Geforce gtx 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 Bit Windows 8 or 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7 or above / RYZEN 5 2600
  • Graphics: Geforce gtx 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -

short_description: An ancient stone was robbed by the FSM (Fake Scary Monsters Organization) they were guarding this stone for years... I want you to take back the stone for our company to come back!
